Exploratory Analysis Project Matheus Amaral Mões, Marcelo Semerene Farah, Luísa Belus Henriques and Daniela de Góes N. Georg 2019-09-09 1 Introduction This project is part of a lesson from FGV’s MBA on Business Analytics and Big Data.
